laboratory_examinations.findings: Serum urea nitrogen level of 68 mg/dL.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Stool studies for C difficile toxin
laboratory_examinations.findings: Initial sample positive for C difficile toxin A; subsequent samples negative.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial hospitalization showed positive results, later results were negative during symptomatic recurrences.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Recent urine culture showed resolution of previous Pseudomonas infection.
